snippet: Angela Kane, the high representative for disarmament affairs, regrets a lost chance to investigate a possible chemical weapons attack in March amid disagreements with Syria over access.
abstract: Angela Kane, United Nations high representative for disarmament affairs, regrets lost chance to investigate possible chemical weapons attack in March 2013 amid disagreements with Syria over access.

byline.original: By RICK GLADSTONE and SOMINI SENGUPTA

lead_paragraph: Angela Kane, the high representative for disarmament affairs, regrets a lost chance to investigate a possible chemical weapons attack in March amid disagreements with Syria over access.

headline.main: Missed Opportunity in Syria Haunts U.N. Official
headline.print_headline: Missed Opportunity in Syria Haunts U.N. Official
